## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the CONTRIBUTING guidelines
- [ ] I have targeted the correct branch (usually `main`)
- [ ] I have added or updated tests in `XmlComparer.Tests` that cover my changes
- [ ] I have updated documentation where necessary (README, XML comments, runner help)
- [ ] I have verified that new and existing tests pass locally
